snippet: JDS Uniphase, a maker of fiber optic networking equipment, estimated that the move would reduce costs by $50 million while allowing the two independent companies sharpen their focus.
abstract: JDS Uniphase, a maker of fiber optic networking equipment, estimated that the move would reduce costs by $50 million while allowing the two independent companies sharpen their focus.

headline.main: JDS Uniphase to Split Into 2 Companies
